messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Question on Book
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Andres, I have a copy and have been very pleased with it. the quality of the work illustrated is unbelievable. Andres Pedraza  wrote:
messages.messageBody:
Hi Andres,
I have a copy and have been very pleased with it. the quality of the work illustrated is unbelievable.

Andres Pedraza <apedraza93@...> wrote:
Gents,

Does anyone have this book? *http://tinyurl.com/mssvz*
**
I'm on the fence on whether to buy it or not. Wanted to see if anyone had it
(or had read it) and what opinion they had of it. Thanks in advance!

Best Regards,

Andres
